messages.content: What did we budget for demolition?

The budget for demolition, site work, and grading for the 1320 Mayfair project was set at $35,600 according to the construction budget document titled "1320 Mayfair Budget.xlsx" on the "1320 Mayfair" Excel sheet.
messages.citation: the construction budget document titled "1320 Mayfair Budget

messages.content: What permits are not yet completed?

The permits that are not yet completed for the 1320 Mayfair Drive project are the "Sewer Line Inspection," "Irrigation System," "Building Final," "Site Final," and "Demo Site" tasks. These tasks are listed as pending in the Asana project " 1320 Mayfair Drive" according to the task data provided.
What happened yesterday?

Yesterday, several activities were reported on the 1320 Mayfair project. The drywall team was working on sanding and finishing any imperfections in the ceiling. Gerardo and Alex were on site, and pavers were being delivered. Additionally, backfill and grading of the front yard were completed, and preparations were made for installing tree save and mulch sock. Gravel installation was scheduled for today, according to Aaron Wilson and Ron Heller on April 28, 2025.
messages.citation: Aaron Wilson and Ron Heller on April 28, 2025

messages.content: When is the project expected to finish?

I wasn't able to find specific information about the expected completion date for the 1320 Mayfair project in the available documents or messages. If you have more specific details or another source to check, please let me know.
How much budget is remaining for landscaping?

The budget for landscaping on the 1320 Mayfair project was initially set at $15,600. The actual cost incurred so far is $1,852.32, leaving a remaining budget of $13,747.68 for landscaping. This indicates that the landscaping budget is currently underutilized by this amount, according to the "1320 Mayfair Budget.xlsx" document.
what was the most recent inspection?

The most recent inspection listed in the Asana task data for the project " 1320 Mayfair Drive" is the "Gas Line Inspection," which is marked as completed. The tasks for "Sewer Line Inspection," "Irrigation System," "Building Final," "Site Final," and "Demo Site" are still pending and not yet completed. Therefore, the "Gas Line Inspection" is the latest completed inspection according to the Asana project data.
has the sliding door material arrived?

The sliding door material has arrived. According to a Slack message from Aaron Wilson, the material for the sliding door hardware arrived to Brendan and is being shipped directly to the office. This was confirmed on April 21, 2025, at 1:15 PM.
messages.citation: a Slack message from Aaron Wilson, the material for the sliding door hardware arrived to Brendan and is being shipped directly to the office

messages.content: Can you check if theres any more recent updates on that?

I wasn't able to find any recent updates specifically related to the context you provided from the documents. However, I can provide some general updates from the Slack messages and Asana tasks related to the 1320 Mayfair project:

1. **Slack Updates:**
   - The drywall team is working on sanding and finishing imperfections in the ceiling, and the pavers are currently being delivered, according to Aaron Wilson on April 28, 2025.
   - Electrical trim work is ongoing, with Max scheduled to continue on Saturday and Monday, as mentioned by Aaron Wilson.

2. **Asana Task Updates:**
   - There are no overdue or upcoming tasks found for the project " 1320 Mayfair Drive".
   - For the project "[MAIN] 1320 Mayfair Drive", several tasks have been completed, such as the approval of plans, asbestos remediation, and various inspections. However, tasks like "Sewer Line Inspection", "Irrigation System", "Building Final", and "Site Final" are still pending.

If you need more specific information or updates, please let me know!
what is set to be done next week?

For the upcoming week, the following activities are planned for the 1320 Mayfair project:

1. **Electrical Trim**: Max is scheduled to start the electrical trim next week.
2. **Gas and Furnace Connections**: Eric is scheduled to install gas and furnace connections on Tuesday.
3. **Floor Reveals**: Joel Matul is set to start floor reveals on Monday, using extra materials from Sylvan.

These tasks are part of the ongoing construction activities and are expected to progress as scheduled according to Aaron Wilson on April 10, 2025.
how much did we spend on exterior doors?
The actual cost spent on Windows & Exterior Doors, which includes exterior doors, is $63,170.58 according to the "Budget.xlsx, 1320 Mayfair" tab.
what did aaron wilson get done last week?

Last week, Aaron Wilson was involved in several activities at the 1320 Mayfair site. On April 28, 2025, he reported that the drywall team was working on sanding and finishing any imperfections in the ceiling. He also mentioned that Gerardo and Alex were on site, and that pavers were being delivered at that time. Additionally, on April 24, 2025, Aaron noted that electrical trim work was scheduled to continue on Saturday and Monday, and he was coordinating with Rick regarding a garage door quote and selections. He also mentioned that he had templating scheduled for Friday for countertops and backsplash, and that Arturo was set to install handrails on April 23, 2025. Furthermore, Aaron was managing the delivery and installation of various materials and coordinating with different teams on site throughout the week, according to Aaron Wilson on April 28, 2025, and April 24, 2025.
messages.citation: Aaron Wilson on April 28, 2025, and April 24, 2025

summaries.content:
1320 Mayfair - Finance Team – Weekly Summary • Week 2025-W18 – Week Ending April 29, 2025

  1. Key Achievements
    • Eric's HVAC team began preparation of AC units.
    • Drywall team completed sanding and ceiling finishing.
    • Pavers were delivered and gravel installation scheduled.
    • Arturo installed handrails.
    • Driveway preparation is in progress.
    • 30-yard dumpster final scheduled for pick-up.
  2. Issues or Blockers
    • Pending arrival of sliding door materials.
    • Pending ETA on registers.
    • Awaiting exterior 3" cans for Max.
  3. Upcoming Work
    • Electrical trim scheduled for Saturday and Monday.
    • Countertop and backsplash templating scheduled for Friday.
    • Raul to finish template work by end of the week.
  4. Action Items
    • Follow up with Rick for garage door quote and selections.
    • Relocate camera to 2387 Poplar.
    • Schedule Raul to add shelves and template next week.

```html 1320 Mayfair - Finance Team Weekly Summary

1320 Mayfair - Finance Team Weekly Summary

Week Ending: [Insert Date]

1) Key Achievements

  • Drywall team completed sanding and ceiling imperfections.
  • Eric's HVAC team prepared AC units for the home.
  • Pavers were delivered and driveway prep is in progress.
  • Arturo installed handrails.
  • Templating scheduled for countertops and backsplash on Friday.
  • 30-yard final dumpster scheduled for pickup tomorrow.

2) Issues or Blockers

  • Pending arrival of sliding door materials and registers.
  • Awaiting arrival of exterior 3" cans for Max's trim out.
  • Need confirmation on limewash order status.
  • Basement floor platform completion status is unclear.

3) Upcoming Work

  • Gravel installation scheduled for tomorrow.
  • Electrical trim to continue on Saturday and Monday.
  • Raul to add shelves for template scheduling next week.
  • Backfill and grading of the front yard to be completed.

4) Action Items

  • Follow up with Rick on garage door quote and selections.
  • Confirm ETA for sliding door materials and registers.
  • Schedule Raul to finish template work by the end of the week.
  • Relocate camera to 2387 Poplar.
```
